Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 2/17/2025

Thank you for using MusicArchive ("the App"). Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle and safeguard your personal information.

Data Collection and Storage

MusicArchive does not collect, store, or share any personal data outside the scope of the App. All user data related to downloading and managing audio files is stored locally on your device and is not transmitted to our servers or third parties.

Permissions

The App may request certain permissions to provide its core functionalities, including access to:

  • Internet: To download audio files from the web.
  • Storage: To save and manage downloaded audio files.

These permissions are solely used for the intended purpose
